task.title: Creating a DITA map
task.shortdesc: oXygen XML makes it easy to organize topics in a DITA map. This is particularly helpful when transforming content into an output such as WebHelp.

step.cmd: Click on the Framework templates folder.
Click on the DITA Maps folder.
A Select editor dialog box will open. Choose the Editor option.
step.stepresult: You will now have a DITA map with the .ditamap extension.
